# Saeta4 - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
- **Type**: REST API
- **Framework**: NestJS
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Runtime**: Node.js

## Coding Guidelines
- Follow NestJS conventions (modules, controllers, services, DTOs)
- Use dependency injection via NestJS IoC container
- Use decorators for routing, validation, and metadata
- Keep controllers thin; business logic belongs in services
- Use class-validator and class-transformer for DTO validation
- Write unit tests with Jest for all services and controllers
- Use async/await for asynchronous operations
- Follow RESTful naming conventions for endpoints
